price: 36. Tokkel tet addal muslimiin buxaaxik inki buxak sá buxa magennino. (woh Nabii luut buxa kinnuk).
arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limīna
